arts.ttl: Was Slovakia win NI's best performance under O'Neill?
arts.sum: Former Northern Ireland strikers David Healy and Gerry Armstrong believe Friday's World Cup qualifying win over Slovakia was NI's best performance under Michael O'Neill.

arts.ttl: Michael O’Neill salutes ‘magnificent’ Northern Ireland in victory over Slovakia
arts.sum: The victory in Belfast leaves Northern Ireland level on six points with Germany, who they face on home soil on Monday, and Slovakia.

arts.ttl: Northern Ireland outclass Slovakia in Belfast
arts.sum: Watch the best of the action as Northern Ireland beat Slovakia 2-0 in their World Cup qualifier at Windsor Park in Belfast.

arts.ttl: Trai Hume nets first Northern Ireland goal in WC qualifying win over Slovakia
arts.sum: Patrik Hrosovsky’s 18th-minute own goal rewarded Northern Ireland for a strong start.

arts.ttl: LIVE: Northern Ireland take on Slovakia in WCQ
arts.sum: Michael O'Neill's Northern Ireland host Slovakia at Windsor Park in World Cup qualifying action. ESPN follows the action.

arts.ttl: Northern Ireland vs Slovakia – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Northern Ireland and Slovakia are set to compete in a crucial FIFA World Cup 2026 qualifying match at Windsor Park this Friday evening. Both teams aim to build on their strong starts in Group A. Slovakia currently top the group following their impressive upset against Germany. arts.ttl: Northern Ireland vs Slovakia – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Northern Ireland and Slovakia face off in a pivotal FIFA World Cup 2026 qualifier at Windsor Park on Friday night. Both sides are looking to maintain momentum in Group A, with Slovakia currently leading the table after their shock victory over Germany, while Northern Ireland sit second following their impressive start to the campaign.
